EmailTemplate.subject: How Titan International Assures Performance and Preps for Growth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-Titan-Success-Story.pdf]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Using Turbonomic, Titan International intelligently controlled virtualized workloads, improved resource utilization, reduced the number of user-generated tickets, reduced time troubleshooting, and ultimately improved performance and efficiency across their environment.
<[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-Titan-Success-Story.pdf]]> <[[https://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-Titan-Success-Story.pdf]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]>
The Turbonomic platform is trusted by the 1,900 organizations to optimize performance and cost simultaneously in real-time. Here's what they have to say <[[https://turbonomic.com/customer-reviews/]]>.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
